mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REFRESH_TOKEN (user_id, refresh_token, expires_in, issued_at, token_status, client_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{refreshToken}, #{expiresIn}, #{issuedAt}, #{tokenStatus}, #{clientId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE REFRESH_TOKEN SET refresh_token = #{refreshToken}, expires_in = #{expiresIn}, issued_at = #{issuedAt}, token_status = #{tokenStatus}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM REFRESH_TOKEN WHERE user_id = #{userId})
